name: Freelancer clone
short_description: The freelancer software creates a marketplace for jobs and services. Thus, this is extensively used by business houses constituting executives and employers as well as jobseekers, contractors and freelancers. The entrepreneurs use the script for job outsourcing at low rates while the freelancers and jobseekers use the same to apply and get jobs, flaunt their skills and talent and thus earn their living. This software is thus useful for employers as well as job seekers. Based on this script is developed the Freelancer clone which is actually a product of Kolkata based IT concern namely Scriptgiant Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
summary: Easy way to outsource for employers is the Freelancer website. Besides
